Add your product categories here. Assign: Add your product categories here. Assign categories to your products to make them easier to browse through and find in your store.
Add your product tags here. Tags are a m: Add your product tags here. Tags are a method of labeling your products to make them easier for customers to find. For example, if you sell clothing, and you have a lot of cat prints, you could make a tag for “cat.”
Good work! Now you can publish your prod: Good work! Now you can publish your product to your store by hitting the “Publish” button or keep editing it.
Upload an image to your product here. Id: Upload an image to your product here. Ideally a JPEG or PNG about 600 px wide or bigger. This image will be shown in your store’s catalogue.
Start typing your new product name here. This will be what your customers will see in your store.
Type a quick summary for your product he: Type a quick summary for your product here. This will appear on the product page right under the product name.
Use the tabs to switch between sections: Use the tabs to switch between sections and insert product details. Start by adding your product price.
